name: 円香
trans: Not going going home early today?

name: 雛菜
trans: Huh~?

name: 円香
trans: You didn't hear me? Never mind then.

name: 雛菜
trans: I AM going home~?

name: 円香
trans: Oh, are you now.

name: 雛菜
text:
うん～
お仕事もないし！
trans:
Yeah~
We're not getting any work anyway!

name: 円香
trans: True enough.

name: 雛菜
trans: Are you staying for extra practice?

name: 円香
text:
小糸と透はね
まぁ、私も今日は暇だし
trans:
Koito and Toru are. 
And well, I don't have anything else to do today.

name: 雛菜
trans:
Mmh~ 
I see I see~!

name: 雛菜
trans: So, are you having fun~?

name: 円香
trans: ...That's your kind of thinking, not mine.

name: 小糸
trans: Oh, Hinana-chan!

name: 小糸
trans: Are you sticking around today?

name: 雛菜
trans: Nah. I'm going home~!

name: 小糸
trans: ...I-I see!

name: 小糸
text:
じゃあ、飴……！
塩分摂れるやつだよ……！
trans:
Then have some candy...!　
This one's salty...!

name: 小糸
trans: We've been sweating, after all.

name: 雛菜
trans:
Yaha~ 
Thank you~!

name: 小糸
trans: And here's one for you, Madoka-chan...!

name: 円香
text:
ありがと
──じゃ、メニュー続けよう
trans:
Thanks. 
──Alright, let's get back to our practice routine.

name: 透
text:
──あははっ
出ないよ、もう
trans: ──Ahaha. It's empty, give up already.

name: プロデューサー
trans:
...You sure? 
Come on...! Hmm....

name: 透
text:
ふふっ
そんな飲みたいの、ミカンの粒
trans:
Hehe.
You want that mandarin pulp that badly?

name: 小糸
text:
──あれっ
プロデューサーさん……？
trans: ──Huh? The producer...?

name: 雛菜
trans: Hmm~? What's the matter~?

name: プロデューサー
text:
いや、そういうわけじゃないんだけど
缶の中にこんなに残ってるのにさ────
trans:
No, that's not it, but...
There's still a lot left in the can.

name: 透
text:
ふふふっ
飲みたいんだ
trans: Hehehe, so you do want it.

name: プロデューサー
trans: Well──

name: 透＆プロデューサー
trans: ──Ahaha.

name: プロデューサー
text:
──みんな、お疲れ
これから自主練かな
trans: ──Hey guys. Putting in some extra practice?

name: プロデューサー
text:
急に邪魔して悪いんだけど
みんなにちょっと相談があるんだ
trans: I'm sorry for barging in all of a sudden, but there's something we need to talk about.

name: プロデューサー
text:
ええと──
１つ、仕事が決まりそうなんだ
trans:
So...
I might be able to arrange a gig for you...

name: 雛菜
trans: Ooh~! That's amazing~!

name: 小糸
text:
し、仕事って……
あの……ライブとか、テレビとかですか……？
trans: A-A gig...? Uhm... like a live concert or a TV appearance...?

name: プロデューサー
text:
……いや、内容を説明するから
やれるかどうか、やりたいかどうか、しっかり考えてくれ
trans:
...Hold on. I'm going to explain what it is. 
Think carefully about whether you can do it, and whether you want to do it.

name: プロデューサー
text:
営業だ
花火大会のステージで歌わせてもらう
trans: It's an event booking. You'll be singing on stage at a fireworks show.

name: 小糸
trans: A fireworks show...!

name: プロデューサー
text:
うん。みんなの他には、地域の子どもたちが踊ったり
演歌歌手、ヒーローショー、お笑いの人なんかが出る
trans: Yeah. Apart from you guys, there's going to be a dance performance by the local kids, an enka singer, a superhero show, comedians, and so on.

name: 雛菜
text:
あは～！
そういうのある～～～！
trans: Aha~, so it's that kind of show~!

name: 円香
text: さぞ業界も注目しているでしょうね
trans: I bet the industry bigwigs are going to be all over it.

name: プロデューサー
text:
……確かに、華やかな場所とは言いにくいかもしれない
ステージも小さいし、席は30脚程度のパイプ椅子だ
trans:
...You're right. It's not exactly the fanciest of venues.
It's going to be a small stage with some thirty-odd folding chairs in front of it.

name: プロデューサー
text:
お客さんは地域の人が中心で、立ち見も自由
仕切りもないし、音響や照明の設備も大したものじゃない
trans: The audience will mostly be local people, and there's a freely accessible standing area. It's not an enclosed space, and the audio and lighting equipment isn't much to speak of.

name: プロデューサー
text:
さらに言えば、お客さんはみんなを見たいわけでもない
他の誰だっていいし、なんならもっと有名人がいいだろう
trans: What's more, people aren't there to see you guys. They'd have welcomed anyone else. If anything, they'd probably prefer someone more famous.

name: プロデューサー
text:
だから、みんなが仕事に求めるものによっては
今回の依頼には価値がないかもしれない
trans: So depending on what you're looking for in a job, this particular one might not have any value to you.

name: プロデューサー
text:
もし価値がないと感じるなら、俺は出演を勧めないよ
もっと頑張って……
trans: If you guys feel that it's not worth it, I won't push you.

name: プロデューサー
text:
みんなの気持ちに沿った仕事をとってくる
必ず
trans:
Then I'll just keep looking until I find something that lives up to your aspirations. 
You can take my word for that.

name: プロデューサー
text:
だから、よく考えてほしいんだ
出たいのか、出たくないのか
trans: So I want you all to think carefully about whether or not you want to do this.

name: プロデューサー
text:
仕事をすれば、嫌なめにだって遭う
自分たちが思う以上に、姿勢を求められたりもする
trans:
If you're taking on jobs, you'll inevitably run into some bad experiences as well.
Some situations will put more demands on your mindset than you might expect.

name: プロデューサー
text:
それでもやるなら、お金とかやりがいとか、
夢……はわからないけど──
trans: So if you're going to do it, it could be for the money, for a sense of fulfillment, for your dreams... whatever those may be──

name: プロデューサー
text:
歌いたいとか目立ちたいとか、貢献したいとか、
なんでもいいから、きっと理由が必要になってくる
trans:
Maybe you simply want to sing or to stand out, or to contribute to something.
It can be anything, but you're gonna need a reason.

name: プロデューサー
text: やっぱり辞めたい、って思うのでもいい
trans: And if you want to quit after all, that's a valid answer in its own right.

text:
そういうこと含めて
考えてほしいんだ
trans: I want you to give all of that some serious thought.

name: プロデューサー
text:
ごめんな。でも、大事なことだと思ってる
──概要の載った資料を置いていくから
trans:
I'm sorry. But I think this is important.
──I'll leave these documents with the event outline here.

name: プロデューサー
text: それじゃ、練習もよろしく頼むな
trans: I'll see you later. And good luck with practice.

name: 雛菜
text:
は～い！
雛菜は行きたい～～～！
trans: Oka~y~! Hinana wants to go~!

name: 円香
text: でも、私もほんとは心配なのかも
trans: But maybe I'm also just worried.

name: 円香
trans: ──Is there any point in doing this?

name: 雛菜
text:
円香先輩、
行きたくないの～？
trans: Madoka-senpai, you don't want to go~?

name: 雛菜
text:
あは～
じゃ雛菜たち３人で出るのか～
trans:
Aha~
So it's going to be just the three of us then~!

name: 小糸
trans: H-Hinana-chan...!

name: 円香
trans:
......
I need to think about this.

name: 小糸
trans: M-Madoka-chan...

name: 円香
text:
いちばん『仕事』していたのは小糸
──小糸がカメラに映ってくれてよかったの
trans:
You're the one who's been working hardest.
──I'm glad you got to be on camera.

name: 円香
text:
どんどん走っていって……
危なっかしいから
trans: She just keeps on running... and it's nerve-racking to watch.

name: 小糸
trans: A-Actually...!

name: 小糸
trans: I want to...

name: 小糸
trans: ...I want to give it a try...!

name: 円香
trans: ......Koito.

name: 小糸
trans:
...!
I-I'm sorry...

name: 小糸
trans: I want to do this... with the four of us.

name: 小糸
text:
プロデューサーさんが言うような理由に……
なってるかはわからないんだけど
trans: I don't know if this is the kind of reason the producer meant, but...

name: 小糸
text:
──やっと……前みたいにみんなと
一緒にいられるようになって
trans: ──I finally... get to spend time with you guys again.

name: 小糸
trans: So I...

name: 円香
text:
ずっと一緒にいられる
……ステージに出なくたって
trans:
We can always be together.
...No need to go on stage for that.

name: 小糸
trans: A-Actually...

name: 小糸
trans: ...I-I wonder about that...

name: 小糸
trans: Wouldn't the rest of you just... keep on going... without me...?

name: 小糸
text: と、透ちゃんだけ……どんどん…………
trans: W-Wouldn't Toru-chan... just keep on going...

name: 雛菜
trans: Yeah~! That's how she is~

name: 雛菜
text: だから雛菜もどんどん行くよ～？
trans: So Hinana will keep on going as well~!

name: 小糸
trans:
──Y-Yeah...!
I thought so...!

name: 小糸
text:
わ、わたしも、だから……
追いかけたくて……！
trans: So I also... I want to be right on your heels...!

name: 小糸
trans: On everyone's heels...!

name: 小糸
text:
みんなと一緒に、練習したり……
衣装を着て踊ったりするの……
trans:
Practicing together...
Dancing in costumes together...

name: 小糸
text: 全然、よゆーになるから……！
trans: It's all gonna become easy-peasy...! No sweat!

name: 円香
trans: Toru...

name: 円香
trans: ...What about you, Asakura?

name: 円香
text: 浅倉を追いかけるって
trans: You heard them. They're following you.

name: 円香
trans: What do you want to do?

name: 円香
text:
浅倉がやりたくないなら、
話が変わってくるでしょ
trans: If you don't want to do it, that changes things.

name: 透
trans: Aah...

name: 円香
text: どうせ、わかんないって言うんだろうけど
trans: I bet she'll say she doesn't know, though.

name: 透
trans: ──Hmm

name: 透
text:
ふふっ
わかんないや
trans:
Hehe...
I dunno.

name: 円香
trans: See?

name: 雛菜
trans: Aha~!

name: 小糸
trans: I-I see...!

name: 円香
trans: But────

name: 円香
text:
どこに行くか知ってて
走り出してる
trans: She's known where she's headed since she started running.

name: 雛菜
text: 透先輩、わかんないのか～
trans: So you don't know, Toru-senpai~?

name: 透
trans: Yeah.

name: 小糸
trans: U-Uhm...!

name: 透
trans: ──But let's do it.

name: 透
trans: It's right by the sea.

name: 透
trans: Seems really fun.

name: 雛菜
trans: Whaaat~! Ooh, you're right~!

name: 小糸
text:
──わぁ……！
海辺の花火大会なんだね……！
trans: ──Oooh....! So it's a fireworks show on the beach...!

name: 小糸
trans: M-Madoka-chan...!

name: 円香
trans: Ugh...

name: 円香
trans: I'll go.

name: 小糸
trans: And your reason for going is...?

name: 円香
text: いいんじゃない？　無くても
trans: Anything wrong with not having one?

name: 雛菜
trans: Oh~?

name: 透
text:
あははっ
いいじゃん
trans:
Ahaha.
Seems fine to me.

name: 透
text: 行きたいから、行きたい
trans: We want to go because we want to.

name: 雛菜
text:
そっか～
じゃあ行こ～！
trans: Okay~ Then let's GO~!

name: 小糸
text:
ま、円香ちゃん
じゃあ……！
trans:
M-Madoka-chan...
So that means...!

name: 円香
text:
──
ほんとに、中身のない会話
trans:
──
What a pointless conversation.

name: 小糸
text:
じゃ、じゃあ……
行けるの！？　みんなで……！
trans: S-So... we're going...!? With the four of us...?

name: 透
trans: Yeah.

name: 小糸
text:
や、やったー……！
プロデューサーさんに言っていい！？
trans: Y-Yay...! Can I go tell the producer!?

name: 円香
text:
行きたい理由は無い
────ただ、言えるのは
trans:
There's no reason for me to want to go.
────But there's one thing I can say.

name: 円香
text: 透にできることで、私にできないことはない
trans: There's nothing Toru can do that I can't do.
